meaningMnemonic: What's another way to call the <kanji>farming</kanji> <kanji>business</kanji>? If you encapsulated it into one word (assuming we're talking about plant farming, here), you could call it <vocabulary>agriculture</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
